subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks’ record (9-26), their current slump (9 losses in 10 games) and the players’ apparent ambivalence make Coach Isiah Thomas’s departure seem like a sure thing. Only the date is a mystery.
snippet: The Knicks’ record (9-26), their current slump (9 losses in 10 games) and the players’ apparent ambivalence make Coach Isiah Thomas’s departure seem like a sure thing. Only the date is a mystery.
